channel.title: Comments on: Colds, clapping, crawling and Cleveland
channel.description: tales in the life of Madeline Ann Downey

item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: ok i retract... she can crawl. albeit slowly and only for a few paces if/when she wants to. she is very opinionated. :)
item.content:encoded: ok i retract… she can crawl. albeit slowly and only for a few paces if/when she wants to. she is very opinionated.

item.title: By: karla
item.dc:creator: karla
item.description: Talk about ADORABLE!!! She should be in baby commercials and I LOVE her giggles! Karla
item.content:encoded:
Talk about ADORABLE!!! She should be in baby commercials and I LOVE her giggles!
Karla

item.title: By: Carrie
item.dc:creator: Carrie
item.description: I do enjoy a good game of speedball. After all it is a combination of soccer and speedball.
item.content:encoded: I do enjoy a good game of speedball. After all it is a combination of soccer and speedball.

item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: she is not crawling... she pushes herself to a sitting position, which means she is on all fours for a few seconds, and can pivot around a bit,maybe move a step or two. definitely some crawling practice. but i wouldn't call this actual crawling, she still just wants to walk everywhere holding my fingers. lucky me! :)
item.content:encoded: she is not crawling… she pushes herself to a sitting position, which means she is on all fours for a few seconds, and can pivot around a bit,maybe move a step or two. definitely some crawling practice. but i wouldn’t call this actual crawling, she still just wants to walk everywhere holding my fingers. lucky me!
